thread.title: WATCH: Eric Decker fumbles on Jets' first offensive play vs. Washington Redskins - NJ.com
thread.title_full: WATCH: Eric Decker fumbles on Jets' first offensive play vs. Washington Redskins - NJ.com

title: WATCH: Eric Decker fumbles on Jets' first offensive play vs. Washington Redskins - NJ.com
text:
â€” Gotham SN (@GothamSN) October 18, 2015 
It didn't take long for the Jets to gift-wrap a mistake for Washington on Sunday at MetLife Stadium. 
After the Jets' defense stopped Washington on a three-and-out, wide receiver Eric Decker fumbled after catching a pass from quarterback Ryan Fitzpatrick on the Jets' first offensive play. See above. PLUS: 10 things Jets fans should know about Washington Redskins 
The Jets' defense has really only been vulnerable this season when the offense and the special teams set the opponent up with a short field. So it was with Decker's early miscue against Washington. 
Decker's giveaway gave Washington the ball at the Jets' 37-yard line. Seven plays later, quarterback Kirk Cousins threw a 2-yard touchdown pass to wideout Pierre Garcon to give Washington a 7-0 first-quarter lead.
